name: Abandoned - ALPHA
description:
||WORKING PROGRESS||

This is a game I have work on for the last 2 months.

its about how you were exploring in the woods and you found an abandoned factory, and went to explore it but got trapped inside and you have to escape for this place.

||CONTROLES||

Move: W A S D

Interact: E

Pick up: Life kick

Put down: Right kick

 Take out inventory: 1 2 3
